name: WWII Battle Tanks: T-34 vs. Tiger
name_original: WWII Battle Tanks: T-34 vs. Tiger
description:
WWII Battle Tanks: T-34 vs. Tiger is a simulation game developed by G5 Software. It came out on 16-11-2007. It was published by Lighthouse Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play WWII Battle Tanks: T-34 vs. Tiger on PC.
